record.field: Issues related to office infrastructure, equipment, or maintenance. Examples include broken furniture, HVAC problems, or cleaning requests.
Requests related to new employee setup, such as provisioning accounts, assigning equipment, or scheduling training.
Technical issues related to hardware, software, network, or systems. This is a broad category for IT-related problems.
Issues related to human resources, such as payroll, benefits, leave requests, or policy questions.
Requests for training or professional development opportunities, including workshops, courses, or certifications.
Non-specific requests or questions that do not fit into other categories. This is a catch-all category for miscellaneous issues.
